Topic.Title: So what price will Icahn make his hostile bid???

Message.Msg: Ichan will lose $200 to $300 million from his misguided DELL stock buys. Expensive way to get his name in the news, but he can afford the loss. Hope this helps.

Topic.Title: Are companies with sales falling off a cliff still in high demand?

Message.Msg: Heard of PCoIP to rid of the desktop and Laptops and move to the next level? Dell acquired WYSE for a reason but execution has been slipping. DT's and LT's are yesterdays products with needing more and more costs added.

Message.Title: Why should pc sales falling off a cliff lower the value of a pc maker?
Message.Msg: Any buyer should have to pay a premium irregardless and worry about pc sales falling off a cliff later.Isn't that what holders of dell stock are expecting to happen?

Message.Title: Onlt dell would try to sell a pc company into the teeth
Message.Msg: of the biggest drop off in pc sales in recorded history.

Topic.Title: Onlt dell would try to sell a pc company into the teeth

Message.Msg: Then on top of that you have braindead shareholders that are expecting any buyer to pay a premium anyway.Like companies with sales falling off a cliff are in high demand.

Topic.Title: Are companies with sales falling off a cliff still in high demand?

Message.Msg: as long as privacy and independency are still important, DT and LT should be still for home and company offices. Looking forward, there is no problem for Dell to do PCoIP. My point is that smartphones or tablets are not the major problem for dell. The problem is the macro economy resulting in its sales down, the ecomomy will be eventually coming back though.

Topic.Title: So what price will Icahn make his hostile bid???

Message.Msg: BashTURD is the biggest JOKE on the yahoo message board. This moron told everyone to sell at $12.50.....He doesn't know the first thing about Wallstreet. Tell the class how you told the board that NO SINGLE ENTITY held more than 1% ownership in Dell and M. Dell had the final decision on everything. BashTURD is an IDIOT. This cat is the dumbest rookie I have ever seen.

Topic.Title: So what price will Icahn make his hostile bid???

Message.Msg: Last week, 14.25-50 seemed more realistic. After the bad report from IBM, the declining price value of HP by over 20%, the declining sales of PC and the withdrawl of the other interested parties,13.65 now looks like a good deal.
